Product name: Antique Old Mine Cut diamond studs ∙ old mine cut diamond post earrings
Description:
A pair of nicely matched Old Mine Cut earrings, totaling just over 1 carat total weigh (1.07). The gems (J-K/SI2) are set minimally in 14K white gold basket studs. The diamonds dance in even the lowest, sweetest light. With small tables, uneven, generous facets, and large culets, this beautiful pair presents all of the best, most charming attributes of Old Mine Cuts.  A perfect gift for someone who loves antique diamonds and enjoys understated jewelry.
Measurements: approx. 4.2mm round
Era: Old Mine Cut diamonds (1900s), modern 14K mountings

Product name: Tooth Fairy Pillow - Tooth Fairy Pillow for Girls
Description:
I love these little tooth fairy pillows! They feature a girl tooth fairy along with a tiny pocket on the front just the right size for those tiny teeth or a treat from the tooth fairy. There's also a pocket on the back of the pillow for your child to leave a note to the tooth fairy, or the tooth fairy to leave a "tooth receipt". Each pillow is personalized with your child's name. The tooth fairy's skin tone, eye color and hair color can be customized. Please consult the last listing picture for a color chart for skin tone, hair and eye colors. 
The pink pillow is made of hot pink with white dots fabric. It features a fairy with iridescent wings bordered in purple, a lime green dress, and a lime green tooth pocket. Your child's name is embroidered in purple. It has a lime green hanging ribbon and bow.
The lavender pillow is made of lavender with white dots fabric. It features a fairy with iridescent wings bordered in light purple, a fairy with a hot pink dress and a hot pink tooth pocket. Your child's name is embroidered in hot pink. It has a hot pink hanging ribbon and bow.
The aqua pillow is made of tone/tone aqua striped seersucker fabric. It features a fairy with iridescent wings bordered in lavender, a fairy with a lavender dress and a lavender tooth pocket. Your child's name is embroidered in hot pink. It has a lavender hanging ribbon and bow.
The pillows measure approximately 4" X 6" and are made using high quality cotton and appliqued. Pillows are stuffed using polyester fiberfill. Each pillow has a coordinating ribbon attached so that your child can hang them on their bedpost or doorknob. No more waking up the child trying to find their tooth under their pillow! The girl version also has a bow attached to the handle.
***In a rush?***
I do a batch of tooth pillows every week (typically over the weekend) and they mail out the following Monday or Tuesday.  I have the processing time set to 2-3 weeks to allow for special circumstances, illnesses, out of stock materials…etc.  That being said, most of the time, pillows ship ahead of schedule, but is it not guaranteed to ship until the “ship by” date listed on your receipt.  If you are need your tooth pillow shipped sooner than the stated date, I would recommend one of two options:
1.	 Add a rush to your order.  I have various rush order options ranging from 1 business day to 10 business days at various price points.  Please keep in mind that the time does not include shipping time.  Shipping usually takes 2-5 days depending of your location relative to me (I’m in Oklahoma).  The rush order listing is found here: 
http://etsy.me/2jUTkpM
2.	I have a selection of my most popular pillows premade and ready for shipping the following business day.  These pillows are exactly like the made-to-order pillows EXCEPT that the name is put on using heat transfer vinyl, not embroidery.  My ready to ship pillows are all found here: 
http://etsy.me/2jUS06l
Please note that fabric choices for the applique or ribbon may vary according to availability and will be chosen to coordinate with the other thread/fabric colors. If you have a specific fabric/ribbon that you would like used in the applique, please contact me directly via the "convo" button.
Please review the store policies for care instructions and shipping information.
Please note in the “Message to Seller” box upon ordering:
-Name for personalization

Description:
Thank you for raising the man of my dreams frame - wedding thank you gift for mother of the groom father of the bride bridal shower gift thank you for raising the man of my dreams frame
I'm happy to change the quote to fit your needs! Just leave me all the details during checkout :-)
About the product
 
These frames are perfect for any decor! Each one is sanded, painted and embellished by me, so no two are exactly alike.   
 
•	Hand-finished wooden frame
•	Dimensions: approx 8"x6"
•	Holds one 4” x 6” photo
•	Custom Color options
•	Custom quote
•	Includes an easel back for tabletop display, comes with glass
•	Includes a cute bag so it’s ready for gift giving – I’m happy to include a note if it’s going directly to the recipient, just leave me details during checkout.
 
  
Custom orders are always welcome!  If you have something in mind, feel free to message me – I’m happy to work with you! Please click ‘ask a question’ above if you have any questions prior to purchasing.
 
~How to order~
To order this item, please click the "Add to cart" button. Leave your customized text or additional information in the “Note to Seller” text box on the left, and then click Proceed to Checkout.
***********  Important Note  *************
 
I do not proof read orders.  I will use the custom information provided upon purchase, so please double and triple check any text before submitting. 
All vinyl lettering will be designed as you write it in notes to seller during checkout so please check capitalization, punctuation, etc. I will use vinyl color that coordinates with your frame color choice. 
 
Please note that these are each handmade and while I do strive for perfection, minor imperfections in each frame add to its charm!  
Most items are ready to ship in about 1-2 weeks, however, please check my Shop Announcement for the current turnaround times. If you need it rushed please message me and I’m happy to work with you. 
US Customers: As soon as your frame is ready, I will ship it out via priority mail!
International Customers: Your frame will ship out via First Class Package International mail. Shipping times vary depending on country and customs. Please contact me for additional options/rates. Buyer is responsible for duties, taxes etc.

Product name: Today My Maid Of Honor Forever My Best Friend Picture Frame, Personalized Maid Of Honor Picture Frame, Maid Of Honor Gift
Description:
Thank you for visiting 2 Chicks & a Basket!
When you check out, enter the following in the notes to seller box:
- Name & wedding date
- Background option (if you like the one shown just say "as is" when you check out)
Our frames are handcrafted by us so they can be fully customized/personalized.  Please include any personalization requests in the "notes to seller" box during checkout.
This frame measures 8 x 8" with a 3.5 x 3.5" opening and is made of solid pine. These have a dark walnut finish on the sides and back. The front is a professionally printed design that we create, print and apply to the frame. We then sand and stain the edges to give the frame a warm aged appearance.
** Frame does not come with glass.** We cut a piece of clear Mylar and include that with the frame in place of glass.  It comes with wood backing and a peg for displaying on a shelf or table.
................................. PRODUCTION & SHIPPING .............................
Please allow 7-10 business days (business days are Mon-Fri excluding holidays) for your frame to be created. This provides enough time to give each order the attention it deserves.
**RUSH ORDERS**
If you need your order faster than 7-10 business days, we do have a rush order add-on that can be purchased separately. This cuts the creation time to 3 business days: 
https://www.etsy.com/listing/194221853/rush-my-order?ref=shop_home_active_8
................................. CREATION OPTIONS .............................
**No proof or picture**  This option is best if you don't want to see/approve a design proof prior to creation and do not wish to have us format, print and include a photo for you.  You can add your own photo as soon as the frame arrives.
**Include a picture**  This option is best if you don't want to see a design proof but you do wish to have us format, print and include a picture with the frame prior to shipping.
**See a design proof**  This option will allow you to preview/change the design of your frame prior to creation.
**Proof & a picture**  This option lets you preview/change the design of your frame and we also format, print and include your picture.
................................. ADDITIONAL  INFORMATION.............................
**If you select the option for a picture to be formatted/printed and included with the frame, please send us the picture via your Etsy e-mail account.**
**If you select the option for a proof, please be sure to check your Etsy e-mail because we will not begin creation until we receive approval on your proof.**
**PLEASE BE SURE to double check the information entered in the "notes to seller" box for accuracy. We will try our best to accommodate any changes sent via Etsy convo but we get a lot of messages so we can't guarantee that we will see your e-mail before starting creation.**
You can check out our policy page for any additional questions you may have: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/2ChicksAndABasket/policy
Feel free to convo us with any questions!

Product name: PERSONALIZED WEDDING GIFT - Framed Wedding Sign, Gift for Bride, Personalized Wedding Sign
Description:
Personalized Wedding Gift by Alphabet Art Photos
♥ ♥ ♥ ABOUT THE ARTIST ♥ ♥ ♥
I am a photographic artist out of North Carolina and take pictures of forms that resemble letters of the alphabet to create a personalized piece of artwork. I also offer numbers as you can see in this Est. Date Print.
I do my own printing, so as well as offering a quick turnaround time I ensure that each print passes my own high standards for quality and finish. Read more on the store 'about me' page; 
www.etsy.com/shop/AlphabetArtPhotos/about
♥ ♥ ♥ ABOUT THIS LISTING ♥ ♥ ♥
♥ This listing is for a framed, personalized DATE print on premium, archival photo paper. 
♥ In the first example picture (the color version) you can see my photo images 'Est.' followed by '8-22-15', which represents the date August 22nd, 2015 (a wedding date). I have also added text to personalize the design with the couple's names, and the wedding venue (City/State).
♥ So, a total of four images (Est. plus date), printed onto one piece of premium, archival, photo paper. The print size is 10x20 inches.
♥ I can print my date prints in color (the most popular), classic black & white, or a stylish sepia tone.
♥ Take a look at the fourth pic in this listing image slider for an idea of the style of number images you can expect in your design (I am always adding to my library so there is a nice variety and I have more than once choice for most of the numbers).
♥ You can include text to add personalized names, venue, quotes, references, sayings etc. This is a complimentary service that I do and it adds an extra personalized touch to the gift. It is optional...you could just get the border around the numbers without the text. If you do opt for the text just let me know via convo or in the 'notes to seller' section during checkout the details you want me to add, and in which position on the layout.
♥ Perfect for Weddings and Anniversaries, and of course a wonderful idea for Christmas! Create your own special keepsake that will be cherished for years to come...
♥ This listing is for the FRAMED print.
♥ I print everything onto one large print (the letters and the personalization), and this fits directly into a frame without matting.
♥ The print will be 10x20 inches.
♥ The color print and also the black & white print will come framed in a black frame. The sepia print will come in an espresso brown frame. Please specify if you want the other color frame with your print.
♥ Most of the pics in the listing image slider show the standard frame. I also offer a wider frame style which can be seen in the final pic in the image slider. This frame is 2.5 inches wide (double the width of the standard frame).
♥ ♥ ♥ HOW TO ORDER ♥ ♥ ♥
1) Select the number of prints you would like in your order using the "Quantity" drop down box (some people like to buy a few at a time, especially around Christmas, because I combine the shipping costs if all are going to the same mailing address).
2) Select the frame type you would like your date print to come in (standard or wider style).
3) Select the color of print you want (Color, Black & White, or Sepia Tone ~ refer to the listing images for a representation of these).
4) During the checkout process you will see an area called "notes to seller" and that is the spot to give me the particular details for your personalized date print (the date, and any personalization you want adding ~ like first names and city/state of wedding venue for example).
5) After ordering please keep an eye out for a message from me (etsy convo) with a proof attached. I will endeavor to supply your proof as soon as I can. The proofing process is your opportunity to make sure everything is looking how you want it and of course to check for spellings etc. Once approved, I can then move forward with your order and print it!
6) If you are new to Etsy please make sure that you have approved your account. Otherwise the messages between customer and seller do not make it through (and this can lead to frustration for both parties ~ especially if your order is time sensitive)
~ Please note my images are under copyright and are not to be reproduced in any way without my permission.

Product name: Wedding Vow Art, Framed Wedding Vows, Wedding Vow Keepsake, Wedding Vow Framed, Wedding Vow Print
Description:
Thank you for stopping by our shop ♥
♥ How it works ♥
1. Choose your favorite listings
2. Type your customization preferences (inside note to seller section)
3. In a 1-2 days I will send you a preview of your wedding design
4. If you want to change something I will do it and send you a preview
5. When you make approval of the preview I will print, frame and pack it
✈ Your delivery will arrive in 2-3 Work Days after our shipment!
(Please NOTE: Some less populated or accessible areas in USA  have an additional tax. Don't worry if that's your case! We will check that and inform you before shipping so we can find together the best delivery solution for you.)
♥ Customization ♥
• Frame type/Pattern/Texture color – (see image 3)
• Vows – send me the text via Etsy message
• Date of your wedding
• Signature
♥ Materials ♥ 
We admire and love nature so we use Eco-Friendly Materials.
• FRAMES: The frames are made from Decorative Photo Polystyrene, which is recyclable. It's  very durable and has anti-corrosion and moisture resistant. 
• VERALITE:
Тransparent sheet which we use instead of glass. It’s more durable than the glass, provides clear, lightweight protection for your design and it’s much easier to transport.  It have an anti-reflective side and it’s 100% recyclable.
• PAPER: We print on 250 gr Elemental Chlorine Free Paper which has very nice white-metallic look.
• BOARD: We use standard cardboard which is 100% recycled.
*** The frames are NOT standard size and they are all made by hand.
♥ Add a Photo Print ♥
If you need printed photograph to your frame add this listing to your cart along with your picture frame and we will print it for you :)
https://www.etsy.com/listing/479927747/add-a-photo-to-your-frame
♥ Coupon Codes ♥
• Order 2 Picture Frames and take 5% OFF.
Coupon code: DISCOUNT5
• Order 3 or more Picture Frames and take 10% OFF.
Coupon code: DISCOUNT10

Product name: Personalized Family Name Sign Picture Frame Established Family Sign 11x21
Description:
Welcome to the MRC Wood Products! We make THE BEST custom carved signs and other fine personalized home decor. Other sellers may copy our designs but they can never match our level of quality and service. When you're looking for a great custom sign, turn to the seller that has been around a long time with a fantastic sales record and will get the job done on time for less than anyone else. Turn to MRC Wood Products.
***ABOUT THIS ITEM***
This listing is for an absolutely gorgeous and unique personalized picture frame.  This can be hung on the wall for decoration or in a window as a sun catcher.  Each piece will be hand crafted with the names you provide.  The glass portion of the frame measures 8" x 18" and the outside dimensions are 11x21.  
This will make THE perfect gift for engagements, weddings, anniversaries, or just because.
  
***HOW TO ORDER***
To order, please just click the "Add to Cart" button at the top of the page and proceed to the checkout. Please enter the information for the item in the notes section during the checkout. Please include:
1. The names to be on the item
2. The est. date (if applicable)
***SHIPPING***
Shipping - All shipping will be via UPS or USPS and most products will ship in approx. 8-10 business days from date of purchase. That may vary depending on the current workload we are experiencing. If you are in a hurry to get an item please let me know and I will do everything I can to speed up the process.
***Extras***
To add a stand to your order, please go here:
www.etsy.com/listing/153223472
To add gift wrapping to your order, please go here:
www.etsy.com/listing/153227124
***WHOLESALE OPPORTUNITIES***
Want to sell MRC Wood Products in your brick and motar or online store?  We have a drop ship program already in place that you may be interested in.  Please send us an email for more information.  We're looking forward to working with you!

Product name: Personalized Family Name Sign. Light Blue & Black. Custom Signs. Reclaimed Wood Frame. Established Family Sign. Rustic. Wedding Gift. 20x10
Description:
Customize this beautiful reclaimed wood frame with your family name and established date. A mixture of modern, vintage, rustic, and classic elements , it will blend seamlessly in your interior regardless of its style. The sign can be hung on the wall or propped on a stand for decoration. It makes perfect gift for engagements, weddings, anniversaries, or any other special occasion. 
OUTSIDE DIMENSIONS: 20in x 10in
INSIDE DIMENSIONS: 16in x 6.25in
Each sign is individually handcrafted and made to order and will look slightly different in color and grain appearance as the pieces of wood are unique. The inside customizable section is a high quality print on textured canvas-like vinyl. The frames come with sawtooth picture hanger on the back for for quick and easy wall display.  
***HOW TO ORDER***
To order, just click the "Add to Cart" button at the top of the page and proceed to the checkout. Then enter the information for each item in the Notes to Seller box. Please include:
1. The NAMES you want on the sign
2. The ESTABLISHED DATE (if applicable)
3. The FONTS for the text (see the options in the images section)
You will get FREE proof with every order and manufacturing will start after your approval.
***SHIPPING***
All signs ship via UPS or USPS approximately 7 business days from date of purchase and proof approval. If you are in a hurry to get an item, please let us know and we'll will do our best to speed up the process.
Custom signs are final sale and can't be returned or exchanged.

Add a unique touch to your bridal bouquet by attaching your engagement photo.  This is a wonderful keepsake to cherish in years to come. Product name: Memorial Bridal Bouquet Charm, Walk with me today Dad, Bouquet Charm, Bridal Charm, Custom Photo, Wedding Charm
Description:
Memorial Bridal Bouquet Charm, Walk with me today Dad, Bouquet Charm, Bridal Charm, Custom Photo, Wedding Charm
This is a lovely way to pay tribute to a loved one who cannot be there on your special wedding day. This is a carefully hand crafted custom photo memorial charm.
This design has the photo of your choice plus the quote "Walk with me today Dad". If you need the word changed from Dad to something else like, Mom, Grandpa, Grandma just let me know in the "message to seller" at check out time.
**This is NOT a DIY item, this does require that you send to me a photo. Either scan one and send or take a photo of one and send but please do NOT crop the photo for me it is easier for me to work with when sent uncropped.
The photo and quote are each 1" in diameter and are in a silver plated bottle cap style charm. Images are sealed with an epoxy type dome cover (recommended not to get these wet). This is a very lightweight charm to attach to your wedding bouquet with ribbon. Please note I do not provide the ribbon as many brides like to color coordinate it with their wedding colors.
Once the listing is purchased, send your uncropped photo to  jcowie [!at] execulink.com or attach in an Etsy convo. You will receive back a proof that will require approval before this can be made. Your photo can be done in color, black and white or sepia tone.
I always highly recommend planning in advance of your event to avoid disappointment.
This will take approximately 7 days to create before it is shipped.
I do carry similar style of charms with different sayings see links below.

Product name: Bachelorette Party shirts | Bridin' Dirty™ and They See us Rollin' We're Celebratin' | Black White and Metallic Gold
Description:
***PLEASE NOTE: - If selecting our "Boyfriend" style tank, please know there may be a short delay in your order, up to a few weeks. ***
Your bachelorette will be nothin' but a gangsta party with our original Bridin' Dirty™ tank tops! This original exclusive design is screen printed with  quality black, and white inks with metallic gold onto comfortable and fitted poly-cotton tank tops. These tanks are perfect for a bach bash with a little attitude. These tanks are super soft with just a touch of stretch for the perfect fit, and are extra-long, so your whole party will be happy! These are not digitally printed, they are individually screened and will last you years after the bachelorette hangover is over. 
Tanks are sold INDIVIDUALLY. Options are as follows:
Black tanks that read "They See us Rollin' We're Celebratin" 
White tanks that read "Bridin' Dirty"
FITTED TANKS:
Comfortable and stretchy poly-cotton tank tops. (57% Cotton, 38% Polyester, 5% Spandex) These tanks are super soft with just a touch of stretch for the perfect fit, and are extra-long, so your whole party will be happy! These run small, we recommend ordering a size up! 
RELAXED BOYFRIEND TANKS: 
A great option for a looser-fit, or to invite the guys to the bachelorette! Our Boyfriend tanks are a unisex cut and run larger for women, true-to-size for men. Our standard XL Fitted tank is about the same size as our S Boyfriend tank. Our model Michelle is wearing an XS Boyfriend tank and a S Fitted tank in the photo size charts for reference.  100% combed and ring-spun cotton construction.
Fully machine washable and backed by a 100% guarantee. Back of the shirts are BLANK, unless a custom upgrade is chosen (see below). 
FITTED TANK SIZE CHART:
These tanks are a slimmer, fitted cut. We recommend ordering a size up.
Our model Michelle is 5'10 and wearing a size Small in the size chart for reference. 
S
-------------
DRESS: 0-2
CHEST TO FIT: 30-32"
LENGTH:26.5"

LENGTH:27"

-------------

-------------

LENGTH:28.75"
BOYFRIEND TANK SIZE CHART:
Our Boyfriend tanks are a unisex cut and run larger for women, true-to-size for men.
Our model Michelle is 5'10 and wearing a size Extra Small in the size chart for reference.

-------------

*******PLEASE ENTER DATE OF PARTY AT CHECKOUT!**********
Orders that come in without sizes or colors may be delayed. 
**Please read***
Please order early: Due to inventory costs, we do not carry a large quantity of each size in stock at all times. Depending on the sizes/quantities you are looking for, there may be a 2 week delay in shipment to allow time for re-printing. Please let us know when the date of your party is so we can be sure to accommodate your timeline.  
If ordering custom back printing: The custom lettering is done using heat transfer letters, similar to athletic jerseys. It is 100% washable, and super cute, but does look a bit different than the screened ink on the front of the shirts. Due to this process being done by hand, it can take an additional week or more to complete orders with custom text on the back.
Additionally, custom back printing is a final sale and is NOT eligible for an exchange or refund. 
Questions or concerns?: We know how challenging planning a bachelorette party can be! If you have any questions, please feel free to email us at info(at)bachette.com if you have any questions! 
WANT A CUSTOM PHRASE ON THE BACK?
No problem! Simply add this upgrade listing to your cart, one for every shirt you would like customized. Cost is 12/shirt and you have the choice of white, red, navy or black lettering. 
CUSTOM BACK UPGRADE: 
https://www.etsy.com/listing/173290245/custom-back-printing
WANT T-SHIRTS?
We will do that! Cost is 25/shirt, and they have to be custom-ordered, which may take up to an additional two weeks. Please message us to set up a custom t-shirt listing.
---------------------------------
Thanks for looking :)
This Etsy store only features a portion of all our product offerings! Please visit our full shop for more goodies and special pricing and deals! http://www.bachette.com
Copyright ©2017 Bachette

============ TURQUOISE USES AND PURPOSES ============
Turquoise is perhaps the oldest stone in man’s history, the talisman of kings, shamans, and warriors. It is a stone of protection, strong and opaque, yet soothing to the touch, healing to the eye, as if carved from an azure heaven and slipped to earth. Its unique shade of blue, often blue-green, lends it name, Turquoise, to all things of this tranquil hue. The delicate veining or mottled webbing in cream or brown is inherent to the stone and serves to enhance its character.
For centuries Turquoise has been recognized as possessing the power to protect riders from injury due to falls. First used as amulets by Turkish soldiers, on their persons and attached to their bridles and trappings, it later came to be used for protection against falls of any kind. Turquoise howlite is also reputed to be influenced by the physical condition of the person who wears it. It is thought to grow pale when its owner is sick or sad, lose all color when the person dies, and gradually recover its color when transferred to a new healthy owner, its color deepening each day. 
Turquoise is a talisman of luck, success, ambition and creativity.
In the workplace, Turquoise promotes leadership, assists relocation or regular travel associated with career, and helps avoid unwise investments. It helps overcome writer’s block, and is a stone of clear communication when giving information; an especially good amulet for those who work in the law, or for local or central government. Turquoise is especially recommended for accountants and computer operators for mental relaxation, for those who work in radio or television to release anxiety, and for laborers to protect from bodily harm. 
As a crystal for travel, Turquoise protects you and your possessions against theft, loss or attack, helps prevent accidents, especially falls, and even guards your pet. Attached to a collar, bridle, or cage, Turquoise howlite prevents animals from straying or being stolen, and makes horses sure-footed and obedient to their riders.
Turquoise is especially useful for clearing the Throat Chakra, and blockages of suppressed self-expression. As jewelry it is worn by men and women alike, and considered a promise of fidelity and protectiveness to a lover or partner. It is used in sacred prayer beads, adorns musical instruments, prayer wheels and bells, and a Turquoise howlite rosary is said to relate prayer to whatever deity is being invoked. Turquoise is traditionally received as a gift to pass on its natural fortune-bringing powers, so if you buy your own, make it a gift to yourself.
Turquoise is a strengthening stone, good for exhaustion, depression, or panic attacks. It enhances physical and psychic immune systems, supporting the assimilation of nutrients, alleviating pollution and viral infections. It is anti-inflammatory and detoxifying, reducing excess acidity and benefiting gout, rheumatism, and the stomach.
Turquoise assists in problems of the brain, eyes, ears, neck and throat, especially cataracts, migraines and headaches, and problems with balance.
Turquoise is a most efficient healer, providing solace for the spirit and well-being for the body. It benefits the overall mood and emotion by balancing and inducing a sense of serenity and peace. Holding or wearing Turquoise helps restore depleted vitality and lifts sagging spirits. It relieves stress and brings focus back to the center heart. It is empathetic and balancing, helping one to recognize the causes of happiness and unhappiness, and to master them.
As a stone of purification, Turquoise dispels negative energy and clears electromagnetic smog from the environment. It promotes self-realization and aids in creative problem-solving, thus calming the nerves when speaking in public. It helps stabilize mood swings, and dissolves a martyred attitude of self-sabotage. It is also empowering if you feel bullied or suffer prejudice. Because it soothes the mind, Turquoise is good for jet lag and fears of flying. 
Turquoise is a stone for finding wholeness and truth, and communicating and manifesting those qualities. It stimulates and harmonizes the Throat Chakra, making it easier to articulate and bring forth one's deepest wisdom. Turquoise empowers those who are shy about sharing their understanding and aids in the knowledge that in speaking from the wholeness of our being, we each have something important to contribute to the collective. 
In traditional thought, Turquoise unites the earth and sky, bringing together male and female energies. Turquoise stimulates the initiation of romantic love, and promotes spontaneity in romantic issues. It is believed to change color to warn of impending danger or to indicate infidelity in thought or action. 
Spiritually, Turquoise heals and cleanses both the energy centers and the physical body. It acts to induce wisdom and understanding, and to enhance trust, kindness, and the recognition of beauty. What we wish for ourselves -- happiness, love, freedom of limitation and fear -- when extended to others by letting go of our insistence of “justice” and viewing others through compassion and forgiveness, we receive those gifts back through our own heart.
============ PYRITE USES AND PURPOSES ============
Pyrite is an Earth element, it also resonates with Fire energy, symbolizing the warmth and lasting presence of the sun and the ability to generate wealth by one’s own power. It is masculine in nature, a stone of action, vitality and will, and taps into one’s abilities and potential, stimulating the flow of ideas. It brings confidence and the persistence to carry things through to completion.  
As a talisman, Pyrite is a unique protector, drawing energy from the Earth through the physical body and into the aura creating a defensive shield against negative energies, environmental pollutants, emotional attack and physical harm. 
Pyrite is a protective, shielding stone and is excellent to wear or carry as an amulet to deflect harm and danger. It is especially helpful when one is away from home or performing hazardous work.
Pyrite guards against ongoing control, criticism and manipulation by a partner, parent or employer, lending the power to resist without becoming angry or upset, changing the balance of power.
A piece of Pyrite in the home or workplace energizes the area around it and imparts an immediate increase in vitality. It overcomes intellectual fatigue due to overwork and tiredness of the nervous system by stimulating blood flow to the brain, increasing mental clarity, focus and recall. 
In the workplace, Pyrite encourages leadership qualities and is an ally for managers and those working toward promotion.
Pyrite enhances the protective and assertive male energies in both men and women. It boosts women’s self-worth and helps overcome tendencies toward servitude and inferiority. For men, it instills a feeling of confidence in one’s masculinity and supports the enthusiastic expression of male eroticism.
Pyrite supports the ideal of perfect health and well-being, drawing on universal energies to activate the nourishing energies of the body. In healing it often gets fast results, and can be beneficial in cases where no resolution seems possible. It is known for bringing out the cause of diseases for examination, and is helpful in getting to the root of karmic and psychosomatic dis-ease. 
This mineral shields the body from environmental pollutants, as well as contagious diseases. It may be useful in fighting colds, flu and other viruses, skin diseases and fungal infections, and may be beneficial in treatments for highly infectious diseases. It has also been used to lessen fever and reduce inflammation, and is an excellent stone of protection for caregivers and medical workers. 
Pyrite increases oxygen supply to the blood and strengthens the respiratory and circulatory systems. It is beneficial to the lungs, helping to alleviate asthma and bronchitis, and may be used in treating blood disorders. It assists in treatments of the bones, both in structure and cell formation, and helps prevent and repair DNA damage. 
Pyrite also stimulates proper endocrine function and is excellent for combating male impotence and infertility. 
Pyrite is a crystal of positive energy, and is extremely helpful for melancholy and thoughts fixed on misfortune and despair. It relieves anxiety and frustration, and as a mirror to the self, reveals the causes behind these emotions and promotes a search for solutions. Pyrite also allows one to see beyond pretense, to what truly lies behind words and actions. It provides the insight that often things that disturb us in others are also present in us.
Pyrite’s energy is empowering to the spirit, encouraging one to overcome fears and take action. It increases one’s will to accomplish whatever tasks one sets out to do, and can be used to bring one out of one’s shell, becoming more dynamic and confident.
Pyrite is an excellent stone of manifestation, allowing one to draw high-frequency energy into the physical body and utilizing it to take action in creating abundance for one’s life. Its frequency stimulates the creative flow of ideas and concepts, and helps one embrace their innate abilities and potential.
